Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=256 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC>256 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC>256 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy against Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Ranalexin. A novel antimicrobial peptide from bullfrog (Rana catesbeiana) skin, structurally related to the bacterial antibiotic, polymyxin.
Literature.Author: Clark DP, Durell S, Maloy WL, Zasloff M.

Literature.Title: Solution structure of the antimicrobial peptide ranalexin and a study of its interaction with perdeuterated dodecylphosphocholine micelles.
Literature.Author: Grassy G.,Chiche L.,Roch P.,Chavanieu A.,Vignal E.
